name: Tea on Rails (WIP)
description:
Tea on Rails is a free co-op game inspired by Overcooked and Animal Crossing.

This game is still in development. If you have feedback or found a bug, please leave a comment down below.

Features:

  • 12 playable levels
  • 11 different ingredients to master
  • A hub where you can relax and put on new hats

How to Play:

  • Go to the top left house next to the train.
  • Select a level
  • Retrieve plants from the slot machine
  • Open the pot with the lever
  • Place the plant in the pot
  • Use coal to make plants cook faster
  • Pick each other up to fix the high pipe

Please play the in-game tutorial as well.

Controls:

Keyboard

Pick Up Items / InteractControlThrow ItemsShift

Controller

Pick Up Items / InteractAThrow ItemsX

Legal Notes:

  • Emoji icons provided free by EmojiOne
